instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: Asus x553ma no power on or charge
threads.message:
Hello
I recently got an asus x553ma laptop.at first it would boot, but then I found only sometimes it would actually turn on, post and start windows.
other times it would just turn on as tho it was going to boot but won't.
I have tried diffirent ran sticks, tried cleaning the ran socket, and looking for physical on water damage or corrosion.

I have not found any signs of water damage.

Last night after trying to get it to boot, it all of a sudden shows no signs of life.
No light, no noise from hard drive. Just dead.

I check for shorts on up1589Q and founding was getting hot.

I have another asus laptop much the same, it's a x453ma and it has the same power of, up1589q.
Tried replacing it and it still shows no signs of life

I put the up1589q if inn the x453ma to see if it was dead, and i5s not. The laptop booted.

I have not been able to find schematics for the x553ma only board view.

Was wondering if I could please get some advice on what to try next.

Thanks

threads.title: Asus x553ma no power on or charge
threads.message:
Check LID signal.
Is the usual fault on Asus for random?y power on...
Remove Hall sensor and test if board always starts.
